taconite.replaceContent:
Welcome to how to strip for ladies.
The goal of this site is to teach the art of stripping to the ladies for their man. No this site is not written by women for women. The reason for this site is because I love women, and I love to watch women strip.
I first want to give thanks to all the sites out there who have tought women how to strip. A special thanks to any and all clothing stores that cater to erotic fleshy presentations. Your work is greatly appreciated and has not gone unnoticed. Please keep up the good work.
